title: Create a New Annual Budget
description: An FP&A manager is starting the annual budgeting process and needs to create the initial budget template for department heads.

tasks.description: Create a new budget version for the upcoming fiscal year in the planning tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new, blank budget for the next fiscal year.

tasks.description: Pre-populate the budget template with historical data from the previous year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent populates the new budget with last year's actuals as a baseline.

tasks.description: Distribute the budget templates to all department heads to begin their input.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends notifications and links to the budget templates to the relevant managers.
